Class Area.CompositeArea

java.lang.Object
eu.iv4xr.ux.pxtesting.ltl.Area
eu.iv4xr.ux.pxtesting.ltl.Area.CompositeArea
Enclosing class:
Area
public static class Area.CompositeArea extends Area
Representing an area that is composed from two other areas using one of the combinators (see Area.AreaCombinator.
